p: Apparent total tract digestibility of DM, OM, and CP were not affected ( p > 0.05) by the tested levels of stevioside ( Table 4). However, apparent digestibility of NDF and ADF quadratically increased ( p = 0.02 and p = 0.01), where NDF and ADF digestibilities increased from 0 to 400 mg/kg stevioside and then decreased from 400 to 800 mg/kg stevioside.
